long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browse Wipe - Clean Your Digital Footprint with Ease.

Take control of your online privacy with Browse Wipe, the all-in-one browser extension designed to effortlessly erase your digital tracks. Keep your browsing experience fast, secure, and private with powerful features that remove browsing history, cookies, cache, and more.

Key Features:
- Instant History Removal: Quickly wipe your entire browsing history or selectively remove entries for specific time ranges, ensuring your online activities remain private.
- Cookie Cleanup: Automatically clear tracking cookies and site data that slow down your browser and compromise your privacy.
- Cache Eraser: Free up space by clearing outdated cache files, speeding up your browsing while protecting your personal data.
- Customizable Privacy Settings: Tailor your cleaning preferences to specific data types like form autofill data, download history, and more.
- Lightweight & Fast: Runs quietly in the background without slowing down your browsing experience.
- User-Friendly Interface: Simple, intuitive design makes cleaning your browser a breeze, whether you're a tech novice or a privacy enthusiast.

Browse Wipe is your trusted companion for a clean, secure, and private browsing experience. Download now and take back control of your online privacy!
